summary: The Agricultural Biorefinery Innovation and Opportunity Act of 2025 amends the Farm Security and Rural Investment Act of 2002 to improve assistance for biorefineries, renewable chemicals, and biobased product manufacturing. It authorizes grants and loan guarantees for projects converting renewable biomass. Key changes include focusing on advanced biofuels and renewable chemicals, revising selection criteria for grants, establishing a priority scoring system, and allocating funding for fiscal years 2025-2029.
